Title: Develop your enterprise playbook to prepare for the AI of tomorrow | BRKSP486
Author: Microsoft Events
Description:
Citrix and Microsoft futurists explore how AI will transform work by operating existing apps alongside humans. See the 7-stage progression from today's shadow AI to tomorrow's agent orchestration. Learn what changes when AI uses your interfaces, why this path beats waiting for "AI-native" apps, and how to prepare now without blocking innovation.
